title: The History of Me: Inspired by Actual Events
description: INSPIRED BY ACTUAL EVENTSDEDICATED TO BRAIN TUMOUR SUFFERERSNO LIFE IS ORDINARYOn June 24th 1943, Mary Hall was born.From that moment on, a story began; a story that unfolded over seventy-five yearsAs her grandson struggles with a piece of college coursework, tasking him with writing about a person in history; Mary offers her assistance. She gives her grandson a book… a book THE HISTORY OF MEMary has recounted seven decades of her life; from the moment an apprentice seamstress meets the man of her dreams... until the progression of time, forces them apart.THE HISTORY OF ME is a tale of love and loss.Based on true events, it tells the story of one woman as she traverses the uneven road of life. It is a story, both uplifting and heart-breaking, and a story that shows…EVERYONE HAS A HISTORY
author: C.M. Stokes
